byline.original: Wireless to THE NEW YORK TIMES

abstract: To conf on Northwest Frontier Prov disorders
snippet: LONDON, Feb. 2--Incomplete reports of unrest on the Northwest Indian frontier, with disorders at Waziristan, and the arrest in Bombay of seven foreigners reached London today....

headline.main: Disorders Reported on Frontier of India; 7 Foreigners, 4 Italian, Seized in Bombay

lead_paragraph: LONDON, Feb. 2--Incomplete reports of unrest on the Northwest Indian frontier, with disorders at Waziristan, and the arrest in Bombay of seven foreigners reached London today.
